content.rendered:
Our Tulips bouquet & Loco Love offers a charming blend of fine taste and local support. These elegant Tulips are lovingly nurtured by our dedicated Australian growers, nestled amidst the scenic landscape of Victoria. Paired with artisanal Loco Love chocolates, handmade in the beautiful Byron Bay.

We add no additional foliage. Varieties may include both single and double Tulips, depending on available in our studio on the day.

Finished with our signature wrap and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this, with no two Tulip bouquet flowers the same! Images are provided for illustrative purposes only. Flower dimensions and colour vary depending on seasons and availability. Please place your trust in us, to choose the finest tuliip flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
